title: BRIEF-Focus Minerals Responds to China Hanking's Offer To Buy Coolgardie Gold Project
text:
BRIEF-Focus Minerals Responds to China Hanking's Offer To Buy Coolgardie Gold Project

Commodities 42 minutes ago (Sep 25, 2019 18:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Focus Minerals Responds to China Hanking's Offer To Buy Coolgardie Gold Project Sept 25 (Reuters) - Focus Minerals : * NOTES ANNOUNCEMENT BY CHINA HANKING ON A NON- BINDING INDICATIVE CASH OFFER IT MADE TO POTENTIALLY ACQUIRE COOLGARDIE GOLD PROJECT * BOARD HAS CONCLUDED THAT HANKING NBIO, AS CURRENTLY PRESENTED, IS NOT A SUPERIOR PROPOSAL FOR PURPOSES OF EXCLUSIVITY DEED * IN ABSENCE OF SUPERIOR PROPOSAL, CO TO CONTINUE TO ENGAGE WITH HORIZON REGARDING PROPOSAL TO BUY COOLGARDIE GOLD PROJECT

BRIEF-Focus Minerals Responds to China Hanking's Offer To Buy Coolgardie Gold Project
description: BRIEF-Focus Minerals Responds to China Hanking's Offer To Buy Coolgardie Gold Project
